text: Miklós Ambrus (31 May 1933 – 3 August 2019) was a Hungarian water polo player. He was born in Eger. He competed in the 1964 Summer Olympics. He won the gold medal at the Olympics. Ambrus died in Budapest on 3 August 2019 at the age of 86.Meghalt Ambrus Miklós olimpiai bajnok vízilabdázó ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Hungarian water polo players Category:Olympic gold medalists for Sweden
title: Miklós Ambrus
